title: Riot let me have a Korean name.
body: So people stop fucking searching me and looking at my proaf normal game match history.

replies.body:
i have a korean keyboard which automatically gets reset to when i enter a game.
do u know how annoying it is to hav to search for like spellthiefs when it comes up as boxes?
ㅂㅈㄷㄱㅅ ㅛㅕㅑㅐㅔㅁㄴㅇㄹㅎ ㅗㅓㅏㅣㅋㅌㅊㅍㅠㅜㅡ

I can copy it when you post/////
lol
